name: Welcome to Dunwich
description:
Welcome to Dunwich is tycoon game(management simulation) which based on lovecraft theme.
Summon things with your Necronomicon, make your haunted house, call guests, get money. $_$

Please Keep This Project Alive:

If you like this project, please help this project alive and grow.
  • You can send me some comments, or suggestions.
  • You can report bugs.
  • You can translate or proofread ingame translations. please contact me via E-mail.
  • You can write article about the game, record let's play video, or suggest game to your friends.
  • You can make a donation for me.
